Articles.Content:
hello, I have problems installing a game, because the game starts, it does not installed. So I can play but not save.

On top of that I can not do the update, it gives me this error message:

'could not update. You may Need to redownload the game :-('

Can you help me plz

thank you

KSP does not install at all, you just copy it wherever you want it and play it from there. Which version are you using? The 13.3 version is a free demo, if you have that you can\'t save your game. The 14.4 full version should save the game automatically (make sure you click 'Space Center', not 'End Flight'). You can also use F5 and F9 for quicksave and quickload.

As for the update error message, that\'s just the Updater\'s quaint way of saying that you\'re using the latest version available to you (13.3 or 14.4 depending on whether or not have you purchased the full version). Much like the game the Updater is a work in progress and this is one of the things that need to be fixed.
